main event: A civilian employee reported a sighting of a brilliant green football-shaped object in Las Alumos, N. Mex. on January 6, 1949.
interesting points: The sighting lasted only 2-3 seconds,The object was observed at 0310 MST,The object moved slowly before noting a change in speed,It was observed from the ground at a low angle,The course of the object was 270 degrees.
